implicit none

integer :: N

integer, dimension ( : ), allocatable :: A

integer(8) :: ... ? Logical :: flag

function possible(N, A) result(res)

integer, intent(in) :: N

integer, dimension(N), intent(in) :: A

logical :: res

integer(8) :: sum, NS, K, d, current, previous

integer :: i, prev_j

sum = 0_8

do i =1,N

   sum = sum + a(i)

end do

NS = (N * (N+1)) / 2

if ( mod( sum, NS ) /=0 ) then

  res = .false. return

end if

K = sum / NS

res = .true. do i=1, N

   if (i ==1) then

      prev_j = N

   else

      prev_j = i-1

   end if

   current = A(i)

   previous = A(prev_j) d = K - (current - previous) 

   if ( d <0 ) then

      res = .false. return

   elseif ( mod( d, N ) /=0 ) then

      res = .false.
segments.label: code_analysis

segments.text:
return

   end if

end do

return

end function possible

program atcoder_AGCO_B

implicit none

integer :: N

integer, dimension( : ), allocatable :: A

logical :: result_flag

integer(8) :: sum_A, NS, K, d

integer :: i, j_prev, current_element, previous_element

read (*,*) N

allocate( A(N) )

read(*,*) A

result_flag = possible(N, A)

if (result_flag) then

   print *, 'YES'

else

   print *, 'NO'

end if

deallocate(A)

contains

logical function possible(N, A)

    integer, intent(in) :: N

    integer, dimension(N), intent(in) :: A

    integer(8) :: sum_total, K_val, NS_val, d_val

    integer :: i, prev_j

    logical :: valid

    sum_total = 0_8

    ! Compute sum of all elements

    do i = 1, N

        sum_total = sum_total + A(i)

    end do

    ! Compute NS = N*(N+1)/2 using kind=8 variables

    NS_val = ( (1_8 * N) * ( N +1 ) ) / 2

    ! NS_val = ( int(N,8) * ( int(N,8) +1 ) ) / 2 

    ! Alternate way, but same ? if ( mod( sum_total, NS_val ) .ne. 0 ) then

        possible = .false. return

    end if

    K_val = sum_total / NS_val

    possible = .true. ! assuming initially, unless found invalid

    do i=1,N

        prev_j = i-1

        if (i ==1 ) then

            prev_j = N

        end if

        current_element = A(i)

        previous_element = A(prev_j) d_val = K_val - ( current_element - previous_element )

        ! Now, check d_val 

        if (d_val < 0 ) then

            possible = .false.
segments.label: code_analysis

segments.text:
return

        end if

        if ( mod( d_val, N ) .ne. 0 ) then

implicit none

result_flag = possible(N, A)

if (result_flag) then

   print *, 'YES'

else

   print *, 'NO'

end if

deallocate(A)

contains

logical function possible(N, A)

    integer, intent(in) :: N

    integer, dimension(N), intent(in) :: A

    integer(8) :: sum_total, K_val, NS_val, d_val

    integer :: i, prev_j

    logical :: valid

    sum_total = 0_8

    ! Compute sum of all elements

    do i = 1, N

        sum_total = sum_total + A(i)

    end do

    ! Compute NS = N*(N+1)/2 using kind=8 variables

    NS_val = ( (1_8 * N) * ( N +1 ) ) / 2

    !NS_val = ( int(N,8) * ( int(N,8) +1 ) ) / 2 

    ! Alternate way, but same ?

    if ( mod( sum_total, NS_val ) .ne. 0 ) then

        possible = .false.

        return

    end if

    K_val = sum_total / NS_val

    possible = .true. ! assuming initially, unless found invalid

    do i=1,N

        prev_j = i-1

        if (i ==1 ) then

            prev_j = N

        end if

        current_element = A(i)

        previous_element = A(prev_j)

        d_val = K_val - ( current_element - previous_element )

        ! Now, check d_val 

        if (d_val < 0 ) then

            possible = .false.

            return

        end if

        if ( mod( d_val, N ) .ne. 0 ) then

            possible = .false.

            return

        end if

    end do

end function possible

end program atcoder_AGCO_B
